# Tablas - Sexo


```{r echo = FALSE}
tab <- data %>%
     tab_prepend_names() %>% 
     tab_cols(total(),DC02) %>% 
	tab_cells(Q00311,
	          Q00312,
	          Q00313,
	          Q00320,
	          Q00340,
	          mrset(..f(Q00360_)),
	          Q00370
	          ) %>%
	tab_stat_cpct() %>%
     tab_cells(Q00330, Q00350_1 %to% Q00350_9) %>% 
     tab_stat_mean_sd_n() %>% 
     tab_pivot() %>% 
	tab_caption('Objetivo 3')
as.datatable_widget(tab, width=900)
```
